description: This file contains styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, defining colors, layout, styling for different components including the App, game header, game board, squares, and reset button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling for the Tic Tac Toe UI, centering content and setting background color.

classes.name: game-header
classes.description: Styles for the header of the game, including font size and color.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styles for the game status display, controlling font size and color.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Creates a grid layout for the Tic Tac Toe board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for each square in the board, including hover effects.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Styles for the reset button, including hover and active effects.
